update_every.title: Update every
update_every.description: Data collection interval, measured in seconds.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout for executing the binary, specified in seconds.

instance_name.title: Instance name
instance_name.description: Specifies the name of the Varnish instance to collect metrics from.

docker_container.title: Docker container name
docker_container.description: Specifies the name of the Docker container where the Varnish instance is running. If set, the `varnishstat` command will be executed within this container.

binary_path.ui:help: If an absolute path is provided, the collector will use it directly; otherwise, it will search for the binary in directories specified in the PATH environment variable.

timeout.ui:help: Accepts decimals for precise control (e.g., type 1.5 for 1.5 seconds).

instance_name.ui:help: This corresponds to the `-n` argument used with the [varnishstat](https://varnish-cache.org/docs/trunk/reference/varnishstat.html) command. If not provided, the hostname will be used.
